achievement.name: Secrets of the Ancients
achievement.shortdescription: Break into the Temple of Etherlight.

achievement.name: Love Literally Hurts...
achievement.shortdescription: Dispatch with the druid in Thornhill.

achievement.name: Death is Merely an Inconvenience
achievement.shortdescription: Complete the quest 'Reunion of Fire and Death'.

requirement.text: Completed quest: Reunion of Fire and Death.

achievement.name: The Savior of Haywind!
achievement.shortdescription: Protect Haywind from the threat of the renegade wizard.

requirement.text: Returned to the Mayor in Haywind after defeating the renegade wizard.
Completed quest: The Great Harvest Melee.

achievement.name: The River Warden
achievement.shortdescription: Protect Aurfield against river pirates and the Great Mudclaw.

requirement.text: Complete the Plague Doctor's Apprentice quest.

achievement.name: Elemental Slayer
achievement.shortdescription: Defeat Zephirix, the Cruel Wind of the North.

requirement.text: Defeated Zephirix, the Cruel Wind of the North.

achievement.name: Friend of Timberwell
achievement.description: Complete all key tasks to become a trusted friend of the Timberwell community.

achievement.name: Animal Protection
achievement.description: Assist in resolving the animal-related issues in Timberwell.

requirement.text: Build a pen for the sheep.
requirement.info: Help the shepherd near the southern road by building a sheep pen.
Assist a child in the northwest forest by saving rabbits from wolves.

achievement.name: Polite Woodland Village Visitor
achievement.shortdescription: Assist locals of Timberwell in everyday tasks.
achievement.description: Lend a hand to the residents of Timberwell with their daily tasks.

requirement.info: Assist the lumberjack's wife, whose husband won't talk to her.

requirement.text: Help the gardener water his plants.
requirement.info: Assist the gardener in watering his plants.

achievement.name: Friend of Grainwater
achievement.description: Assist the people of Grainwater by completing all their key tasks.

achievement.name: Beer in Demand
achievement.description: Help the bartender in Grainwater by providing the necessary assistance.

requirement.info: The bartender in the tavern's basement could use some help.

achievement.name: Sobering Up
achievement.description: Help the Mayor of Grainwater by waking up the village drunkards.

requirement.text: Wake up the drunkards in Grainwater.
requirement.info: Pour water on the sleeping drunks in the town square.

achievement.name: Cart Delivery
achievement.description: Help the cart seller by delivering wood for her business.

requirement.info: The cart seller at Grainwater's Value Carts shop is in need of more wood for her carts.

achievement.name: Friend of Haywind
achievement.description: Assist the people of Haywind by completing various tasks around the village.

achievement.name: The Model Citizen
achievement.shortdescription: Assist citizens of Haywind in everyday tasks.
achievement.description: Help various citizens of Haywind with their daily challenges.

requirement.info: Help a farmer at Barnsmill Estate.
Assist the bartender at the Singing Sparrow Tavern in South Haywind.
Help a lumberjack at the lumber camp between the market and harbor.
Assist the librarian at Haywind College on the 2nd floor.

achievement.name: Open for Business
achievement.description: Help local shopkeepers by running errands and helping with supplies.

requirement.info: Assist the merchant at Haywind Town Hall.
Help the meat vendor in the market district.
Assist the furniture vendor at the market district.

achievement.name: Law and Order
achievement.description: Help the militia by providing supplies and scouting for threats.

requirement.info: Assist the scout near Silderstone Pass, south of Haywind.
Assist Sergeant Gray near the militia headquarters.
Assist Sergeant Carter with first aid supplies.
Help Sergeant Miller deal with a bandit near the docks.

achievement.name: Friend of Ratcliffe
achievement.description: Earn the trust of the people of Ratcliffe by solving their pressing problems.

achievement.name: Trouble in the Mining Community
achievement.description: Help residents of Ratcliffe with strange issues happening inside their homes.

requirement.text: Deal with rats in the marketplace
requirement.info: Help a vendor at the market by getting rid of the rats causing trouble.
Help an elderly villager in their home near the road leading to the mountain.

requirement.text: Assist child with a magical mishap
requirement.info: Help a child after an accidental spell gone wrong, near the mountain road.

achievement.name: Silderstone Mysteries
achievement.description: Investigate strange occurrences near Ratcliffe's mountain summit.

requirement.info: Help a frightened villager in the market square by destroying a cursed statue on the hill.
Assist a miner near the cave in the mountains by retrieving his lost equipment.

achievement.name: Stable Solutions
achievement.description: Assist travelers and solve problems involving horses and carts.

requirement.info: Assist a traveler north of the chapel by moving hay bales.

requirement.text: Craft a saddle for the rider
requirement.info: Help a rider in the market square by crafting a saddle for his horse.
Help a villager find his missing horse near the Ratcliffe gate.

achievement.name: Friend of Evergreen Hearth
achievement.shortdescription: Complete the quest and all tasks in Evergreen Hearth.
achievement.description: Become the trusted outlander in Evergreen Hearth.

achievement.name: Wintervillage Festival Crasher
achievement.shortdescription: Complete all tasks at the village of Evergreen Hearth.
achievement.description: Join in on festival celebrations at Evergreen Hearth and assist the village people.

requirement.text: Make deliveries of firewood in the village

achievement.name: The Frozen Wilds
achievement.shortdescription: Complete all wilderness related tasks in Winterpine Forests.
achievement.description: Brave the frozen wilds of Winterpine Forests while assisting the villagers of Evergreen Hearth.

requirement.text: Deliver resources to the Village Hall
requirement.info: Deliver resources from gatherers in the wilderness back to the Village Hall.

requirement.text: Make the delivery of a 'gift' to the lumberyard

achievement.name: Ashenside Ally
achievement.shortdescription: Complete key tasks in Ashenside Fields.
achievement.description: Earn the trust of the farmers and protect Ashenside Fields from various threats.

achievement.name: Farmwork
achievement.shortdescription: Assist Ashenside farmers in working the fields.
achievement.description: Support the farmers of Ashenside Fields by helping with critical fieldwork tasks.

requirement.text: Get rid of the rats in the fields
requirement.info: Clear out the rats bothering a farmer in the eastern field of Shearston Estate.

requirement.text: Build scarecrows to protect the crops
requirement.info: Assist a farmer at the west gate of Shearston by gathering materials and building scarecrows to ward off crows.

achievement.name: Patrolling the Fields
achievement.description: Aid the locals of Ashenside Fields in defending their land from dangers that threaten their livelihood.

requirement.text: Protect the shepherd's sheep from outlaws
requirement.info: Assist a shepherd on the northern side of Shearston in defending his sheep from outlaw attacks.

requirement.text: Bring beer to the thirsty scout
requirement.info: Help the scout, stationed south-west of the militia camp, by fetching him a drink from the tavern.

achievement.name: Friend of Mistywood
achievement.shortdescription: Complete key tasks in the Mistywood.
achievement.description: Complete all key tasks in Mistywood to earn the trust of its residents.

achievement.name: Mistywood Forager
achievement.description: Assist the people of Mistywood by foraging for essential supplies.

requirement.info: Find the farmer in the southern part of Fog’s Dwindling and collect 20 corn for him.
Deliver 6 red and 6 blue berries to the fisherman at the pier in Fog's Dwindling.

achievement.name: Wild Hunt
achievement.shortdescription: Hunt wild creatures in the Mistywood.
achievement.description: Help with tracking and hunting the wild creatures of Mistywood.

requirement.info: Retrieve bear paws as a gift for the soldier stationed near the Fog’s Dwindling gate.
Assist the hunters with their assault on the goblin camp located in the southeastern region of Mistywood.
Gather snake skins for a shaman near the lake in Mistywood.

achievement.name: Forestland Samaritan
achievement.shortdescription: Assist people of Mistywood in everyday tasks.
achievement.description: Support the merchants and workers of Mistywood with their various tasks.

requirement.text: Help prepare a meal at the chapel
requirement.info: Assist a woman at the chapel in Fog’s Dwindling by gathering ingredients for a meal.

requirement.text: Provide a new axe to the woodcutter
requirement.info: Help a woodcutter at the eastern lumber camp by providing a new axe.
Help the alchemist’s assistant with the garden at the alchemist's hut, north of Fog’s Dwindling.

achievement.name: Friend of Thornhill
achievement.shortdescription: Complete key tasks in the City of Thornhill.
achievement.description: Become a pillar of Thornhill by supporting its merchants, guards, and skilled citizens in their day-to-day tasks and troubles.

achievement.name: Chaos at the Market
achievement.description: Support the merchants of Thornhill by solving their issues and helping protect their businesses.

requirement.text: Deliver a package to Rainer's general store
requirement.info: Deliver a package to Rainer's general store on Beggar's Gate Street.
Help the merchant at the general store near Beggar's Gate by bringing him crafting materials.

requirement.text: Catch a bandit stealing from a marketplace merchant
requirement.info: Find the merchant in the marketplace and help him catch the thief.

achievement.name: Guardsman of Thornhill
achievement.shortdescription: Complete tasks related to Thornhill guards.
achievement.description: Help the guards of Thornhill maintain order and protect the town by completing tasks that ensure safety.

requirement.text: Fight a guard to test your skills
requirement.info: Meet the guard outside Castle Murk near the east gate and challenge him to a sparring match.

requirement.text: Assist a guard in escorting a man out of the city
requirement.info: Help the guard near the Beggar's Way bank by escorting a guest out of the city.
Find the guard outside the south gate near the cotton field and eliminate the bears threatening travelers.

achievement.name: Tradesmen of the City
achievement.shortdescription: Assist Thornhill tradesmen with their tasks.
achievement.description: Help Thornhill's skilled workers perfect their crafts by offering your assistance and improving the town’s trade.

requirement.text: Assist an alchemist learning a new medicine recipe
requirement.info: Meet the alchemist in northern Thornhill at Mudderside and gather ingredients for their experiments.
Locate the sailor in Thornhill harbor and help secure the ship’s cargo.

requirement.text: Assist a handyman in fixing a sign
requirement.info: Help the handyman at the Thornhill Preservation Society near Baronsgate repair a sign.

achievement.name: Friend of Fenwater
achievement.shortdescription: Complete key tasks at Fenwater Village.
achievement.description: Earn the trust and admiration of Fenwater by helping its residents and completing important tasks.

achievement.name: Fenwater Groundskeeper
achievement.shortdescription: Assist in mainting order at Fenwater Village.
achievement.description: Aid in the upkeep and safety of Fenwater by addressing critical town needs.

requirement.text: Clean trash from the Fenwater road
requirement.info: Help the sweeper on the road to Thornhill.

requirement.text: Deal with a bandit in the village
requirement.info: Help a man near the bank.
Assist the farmer north of Fenwater.

achievement.name: Rural Village Work
achievement.shortdescription: Complete gathering tasks for the people of Fenwater Village.
achievement.description: Assist the skilled tradespeople of Fenwater in their important tasks.

requirement.info: Meet the farmer on the eastern farm.

requirement.text: Help a blacksmith by collecting ores
requirement.info: Meet the blacksmith by the river.
Find the fisherman south of Fenwater.

achievement.name: Bogside Disruptions
achievement.shortdescription: Assist Fenwater Village people with problems.
achievement.description: Support the hardworking villagers of Fenwater by helping them with their essential tasks and responsibilities.

requirement.info: Help the lumberjack find his son in the southern forest.

requirement.text: Help build a cart for traders
requirement.info: Assist the trader near the market with building a cart.
Collect herbs for the apothecary near the bank.

achievement.name: Predators of the Silvermirror Fen
achievement.shortdescription: Complete key tasks in the Silvermirror Fen.
achievement.description: Protect the residents of Silvermirror Fen by hunting monsters and helping them survive the treacherous swamp.

requirement.text: Help the weak survive the swamp

achievement.name: Monster Slayer
achievement.shortdescription: Resolve tasks related to hunting monsters in the Silvermirror Fen.
achievement.description: Assist the hunters and travelers by slaying the dangerous creatures that lurk in the swamp.

requirement.info: A traveler is being harassed by mosquitoes and needs help to continue their journey.

requirement.text: Aid a hunter in the southern swamp
requirement.info: A hunter is stuck in the swamp due to swamp tentacles and needs assistance.
Assist the hunter in killing aggressive lizards east of Bootlegger's Shelter.

achievement.name: Swamp Survivor
achievement.shortdescription: Save people struggling to survive in the Silvermirror Fen.
achievement.description: Assist the vulnerable people of Silvermirror Fen by helping them navigate the dangers of the swamp.

requirement.info: Help an injured miner deep in the southern swamp.
Help the fisherman at Bootlegger's Shelter who is struggling to catch fish.
Find and help a sick boy suffering from mosquito bites northwest of Bootlegger's Shelter.

achievement.name: Explorer of Spurce Shade's Rest
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations in Spruce Shade woods and Timberwell.

requirement.text: Visit the outlaw camp by the pond.

achievement.name: Grainwater Explorer
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations near Grainwater village.

achievement.name: Silderstone Explorer
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations near Ratcliffe village.

achievement.name: Ashenside Explorer
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations in Ashenside Fields, west of Haywind.

requirement.text: Visit the site of the ongoing battle.

achievement.name: Explorer of Green Coppice
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations in the woods north of Haywind.

requirement.text: Visit the ruins of Barnosgreene village.

achievement.name: Explorer of Fog's Dwindling
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations near the village of Fog's Dwindling.

requirement.text: Visit the blacksmith and the quarry.
Visit the town of Fog's Dwindling.

achievement.name: Aurfield Explorer
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations near Aurfield village.

achievement.name: Deep Forest Explorer
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations within the thickets of Mistywood.

achievement.name: Explorer of Harshwind Shores
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations near Harshwind Shore.

achievement.name: Explorer of Prowler's Thicket
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations in the Prowler's Thicket.

achievement.name: Fenwater Explorer
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations near Fenwater Village.

requirement.text: Visit the great cliff of Fenwater village.

achievement.name: Bootlegger's Explorer
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations near Bootlegger's Shelter.

requirement.text: Visit the hut of 'The Real Witch'.

achievement.name: Silvermirror Explorer
achievement.shortdescription: Discover key locations in the Silvermirror Fen.

achievement.name: Novice Miner
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Mining. The earth yields its first treasures to your novice hands.

achievement.name: Apprentice Miner
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Mining. The deeper you dig, the greater the riches.

achievement.name: Adept Miner
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Mining. Your pickaxe strikes with practiced precision, bringing forth rare minerals.

achievement.name: Skilled Miner
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Mining. Your skill in mining is evident as you uncover valuable resources.

achievement.name: Expert Miner
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Mining. Mastery of the craft reveals veins of precious gems.

achievement.name: Master Miner
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Mining. Only a master miner can extract the rarest and most valuable ores.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Miner
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Mining. As a grandmaster, no stone or gem can escape your expert eyes.

achievement.name: Novice Fisherman
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Fishing. The rivers and lakes yield their first catch to you.

achievement.name: Apprentice Fisherman
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Fishing. You can now consistently reel in decent catches.

achievement.name: Adept Fisherman
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Fishing. Bigger and rarer fish are now within your grasp.

achievement.name: Skilled Fisherman
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Fishing. Your skill has turned you into a master of both rod and reel.

achievement.name: Expert Fisherman
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Fishing. The waters now reveal their most elusive and valuable catches to you.

achievement.name: Master Fisherman
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Fishing. A master fisherman, your skill draws the finest catches.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Fisherman
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Fishing. As a grandmaster fisherman, you now catch only the rarest and most legendary fish.

achievement.name: Novice Craftsman
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Crafting. Your hands begin to shape simple but useful items.

achievement.name: Apprentice Craftsman
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Crafting. Your creations are more refined and valuable.

achievement.name: Adept Craftsman
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Crafting. Your skill allows for complex and intricate designs.

achievement.name: Skilled Craftsman
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Crafting. Your craftsmanship is widely recognized for its quality and detail.

achievement.name: Expert Craftsman
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Crafting. Only an expert can create items of such beauty and utility.

achievement.name: Master Craftsman
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Crafting. Your mastery is evident in every piece you create, each a work of art.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Craftsman
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Crafting. As a grandmaster, your items are legendary and coveted by all.

achievement.name: Novice Sorcerer
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Sorcery. Your spells are weak but effective.

achievement.name: Apprentice Sorcerer
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Sorcery. You can now control more powerful spells.

achievement.name: Adept Sorcerer
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Sorcery. Your understanding of magic allows for advanced spellcasting.

achievement.name: Skilled Sorcerer
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Sorcery. Your magic is now a force to be reckoned with.

achievement.name: Expert Sorcerer
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Sorcery. The arcane arts reveal their deepest secrets to you.

achievement.name: Master Sorcerer
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Sorcery. As a master sorcerer, your magic is unrivaled.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Sorcerer
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Sorcery. A grandmaster sorcerer wields magic beyond mortal comprehension.

achievement.name: Novice Attacker
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Attack. Your strikes are basic but effective.

achievement.name: Apprentice Attacker
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Attack. Your combat abilities have improved, delivering more precise strikes.

achievement.name: Adept Attacker
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Attack. You now deliver more powerful and swift blows in battle.

achievement.name: Skilled Attacker
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Attack. Your skills in combat make you a formidable opponent.

achievement.name: Expert Attacker
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Attack. Your attacks are lethal, cutting down enemies with ease.

achievement.name: Master Attacker
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Attack. You strike with unmatched precision and power.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Attacker
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Attack. As a grandmaster attacker, no enemy can withstand your blows.

achievement.name: Novice Archer
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Archery. Your aim is steady, and your arrows find their mark.

achievement.name: Apprentice Archer
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Archery. Your shots are more accurate, and your enemies fall from a distance.

achievement.name: Adept Archer
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Archery. You strike from afar with deadly precision.

achievement.name: Skilled Archer
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Archery. Your bow is an extension of your body, and your skill is unmatched.

achievement.name: Expert Archer
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Archery. Your arrows strike with deadly precision, even at great distances.

achievement.name: Master Archer
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Archery. You are a master of the bow, feared by all who face you.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Archer
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Archery. As a grandmaster archer, your enemies fall before they even see you.

achievement.name: Novice Defender
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Defence. Your shield is your first line of defense, deflecting attacks.

achievement.name: Apprentice Defender
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Defence. You hold your ground with confidence, fending off stronger attacks.

achievement.name: Adept Defender
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Defence. Your defensive prowess allows you to block and parry effortlessly.

achievement.name: Skilled Defender
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Defence. Your defenses are impenetrable, making you a stalwart force in battle.

achievement.name: Expert Defender
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Defence. Few can match your ability to block, dodge, and absorb attacks.

achievement.name: Master Defender
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Defence. You are a master of defense, capable of withstanding the fiercest assaults.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Defender
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Defence. As a grandmaster defender, you stand unshakable, the ultimate bastion in battle.

achievement.name: Novice Smith
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Smithing. You can forge basic weapons and tools with confidence.

achievement.name: Apprentice Smith
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Smithing. Your creations are now more durable and efficient.

achievement.name: Adept Smith
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Smithing. Your forge produces items of remarkable quality.

achievement.name: Skilled Smith
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Smithing. Your skill as a smith is evident in the superior quality of your work.

achievement.name: Expert Smith
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Smithing. Your mastery of the forge allows you to create items of exceptional power and durability.

achievement.name: Master Smith
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Smithing. You are a master smith, capable of creating legendary weapons and armor.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Smith
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Smithing. As a grandmaster smith, your creations are unmatched in strength and value.

achievement.name: Novice Woodsman
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Woodsmanship. You can now fell small trees and gather basic wood.

achievement.name: Apprentice Woodsman
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Woodsmanship. You cut down trees with greater efficiency, gathering more useful wood.

achievement.name: Adept Woodsman
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Woodsmanship. You can now chop down large trees and gather rare types of wood.

achievement.name: Skilled Woodsman
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Woodsmanship. Your knowledge of wood types allows you to gather the most valuable resources.

achievement.name: Expert Woodsman
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Woodsmanship. You harvest wood with unmatched precision and skill.

achievement.name: Master Woodsman
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Woodsmanship. You are a master at gathering the rarest and most valuable wood.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Woodsman
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Woodsmanship. As a grandmaster woodsman, no forest is beyond your mastery.

achievement.name: Novice Alchemist
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Alchemy. You can now brew basic potions with common ingredients.

achievement.name: Apprentice Alchemist
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Alchemy. You are able to brew stronger and more effective potions.

achievement.name: Adept Alchemist
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Alchemy. You now have the skill to create advanced potions and elixirs.

achievement.name: Skilled Alchemist
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Alchemy. Your brews are renowned for their potency and effectiveness.

achievement.name: Expert Alchemist
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Alchemy. You are able to brew rare and powerful potions that few others can replicate.

achievement.name: Master Alchemist
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Alchemy. You are a master alchemist, capable of creating legendary potions.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Alchemist
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Alchemy. As a grandmaster alchemist, your brews are highly sought after for their unmatched power.

achievement.name: Novice Tailor
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Tailoring. You can sew basic garments and simple outfits.

achievement.name: Apprentice Tailor
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Tailoring. Your tailoring skills allow you to create more durable and refined clothing.

achievement.name: Adept Tailor
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Tailoring. You can now craft stylish and well-fitting garments with ease.

achievement.name: Skilled Tailor
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Tailoring. Your clothes are crafted with precision and are highly valued for their quality.

achievement.name: Expert Tailor
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Tailoring. You can now create garments that are not only functional but also works of art.

achievement.name: Master Tailor
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Tailoring. As a master tailor, your garments are known for their beauty and utility.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Tailor
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Tailoring. As a grandmaster tailor, your creations are legendary and coveted by all.

achievement.name: Novice Cook
achievement.description: Reach level 10 in Cooking. You can now prepare basic meals with simple ingredients.

achievement.name: Apprentice Cook
achievement.description: Reach level 20 in Cooking. Your meals are now more nutritious and flavorful.

achievement.name: Adept Cook
achievement.description: Reach level 40 in Cooking. You can prepare a variety of dishes with ease, pleasing the palates of many.

achievement.name: Skilled Cook
achievement.description: Reach level 50 in Cooking. Your culinary skills allow you to create meals that are both delicious and nutritious.

achievement.name: Expert Cook
achievement.description: Reach level 75 in Cooking. Your meals are renowned for their taste and presentation, making you a sought-after cook.

achievement.name: Master Cook
achievement.description: Reach level 90 in Cooking. As a master cook, your dishes are works of culinary art, satisfying even the most discerning tastes.

achievement.name: Grandmaster Cook
achievement.description: Reach level 100 in Cooking. As a grandmaster cook, your meals are legendary, savored by all who taste them.

achievement.name: Silvermirror Fen Mosquito Exterminator
achievement.shortdescription: Slay 400 Giant Mosquitoes in Silvermirror Fen.

requirement.text: Slay 400 Giant Mosquitoes in Silvermirror Fen

achievement.name: Silvermirror Fen Tentacle Destroyer
achievement.shortdescription: Slay 60 Tentacle Creatures in Silvermirror Fen.

requirement.text: Slay 60 Tentacle Creatures in Silvermirror Fen

achievement.name: Industrial Revolution
achievement.shortdescription: Unlock the Shearston Loom and amass 100 Shearston Tokens.

achievement.name: Cutting Edge
achievement.shortdescription: Unlock the Thornbark Sawmill and amass 100 Thornbark Tokens.

achievement.name: O' Captain, my Captain!
achievement.shortdescription: Equip Pirate Captain's overcoat, hat and cutlass.

achievement.name: Blessings of the Stone Father
achievement.shortdescription: Pray 5 times at the stone altar.

requirement.text: Pray up to five times at the Stone Father's altar.

achievement.name: Horsy's Best Friend
achievement.shortdescription: Feed Horsy 100 carrots during your adventures.

achievement.name: A Proud Homeowner
achievement.description: You've purchased a home of your own, well done!

achievement.name: Lord of Many Houses
achievement.description: Owning 10 houses is no small feat, you're retaking control over the realm one house at a time!

achievement.name: The Realest Baron of the Mountains
achievement.shortdescription: Place the Banner of Domination on the highest floor of the Squallstone Keep.
achievement.description: Acquire the Banner of Domination and place it upon the highest floor of the castle.

requirement.text: Become the owner of the Squallstone Keep.
Place the banner upon the highest floor of the castle.
